q: Alassane Ouattara was recognised by world leaders as the winner of a Nov. 28 election, but has struggled to get control of the country's finances from incumbent Laurent Gbagbo who has resisted pressure to step down. Ivory Coast has no money to pay any debt at all, Patrick Achi , a spokesman for Alassane Ouattara 's rival government, told Reuters, days before the grace period for the coupon for Ivory Coast's$ 2.3 billion Eurobond due 2032 runs out. as the Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. The move follows last month's resignation of ex-News of the World editor Andy Coulson amid continuing controversy surrounding phone-hacking allegations. The Prime Minister said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. Craig Oliver has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the Government's programme. WalesOnline, the best source for Welsh news, sport, business and entertainment. the Pentagon chief said, in effect, never mind. The three services, he announced, can decide for themselves how to prepare for the future.`` This is a big organization,'' he said. The services make lots of decisions. It would be foolhardy to try to micromanage from the top... every aspect of everything that is going on. If the review was overdue, the way Donald Rumsfeld went about doing it was downright peculiar. Instead of using active-duty officers to run the show, he at first went outside to retirees for advice. On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city`` rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city.''
